message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want to be fair, but inflation is working against me. Let's find a compromise: 52.5% / 47.5%?
Considering the inflation, I'll make a small concession. 58-42 is the best I can do.
Alice, we're running out of time, and this is impacting me significantly. I'm willing to come down a bit to 54/46. It's a fair deal considering the circumstances.
I see you're feeling the pressure of inflation, but I still think 57-43 is a more reasonable split.
Alice, we're past the halfway point, and I need you to meet me closer to the middle. 55/45 is my final offer.
You said 55/45 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll give you a tiny bit more, 56-44, and that's as far as I'll go.
Alice, you're right. I was bluffing.  However, we are running out of time.  This is my absolute final offer.
